article_title: OPS's Edison Elementary School set to ban peanut products, tree nuts
article_text:
Thank you for reading and relying on Omaha.com for your news and information. You have now viewed your 30 day allowance of 12 free Omaha.com articles. og.description: The school sent a letter to families earlier this week notifying them that the school has students with severe, potentially life-threatening airborne allergies to both types of nuts and requesting that students not bring snacks, treats or lunches that contain them.
og.title: OPS's Edison Elementary School set to ban peanut products, tree nuts

article_metadata.description: The school sent a letter to families earlier this week notifying them that the school has students with severe, potentially life-threatening airborne allergies to both types of nuts and requesting that students not bring snacks, treats or lunches that contain them.
